name: How will you take it?
description:
*WARNING COARSE LANGUAGE*

It's your first day at work.

Do what your boss tells you?

[Press F to enable fullscreen]
[Drag mug onto the door icon to change room]

By Bernice Wong (Bolero) - Art

& Olivier Perrault (FoodFish) - Programming

made for the Indie Revolution Expo
